languages.text: "Смотрите, там есть спуск к воде! Быть может, прервемся на мгновение и сходим посмотреть?"
"Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"
languages.original_text: "Смотрите, там есть спуск к воде! Быть может, прервемся на мгновение и сходим посмотреть?"

traits.locale_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"
"Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"
"Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"
"Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"
"Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"

languages.text: “看，我们可以从这里下水！要不要绕远一点过去仔细看看？”
languages.original_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"

traits.locale_text: “看，我们可以从这里下水！要不要绕远一点过去仔细看看？”

languages.text: "Seht nur, hier kommen wir zum Wasser hinunter! Könnten wir vielleicht einen kurzen Umweg machen, um uns das näher anzusehen?"
languages.original_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"

traits.locale_text: "Seht nur, hier kommen wir zum Wasser hinunter! Könnten wir vielleicht einen kurzen Umweg machen, um uns das näher anzusehen?"

languages.text: « Regardez, on peut descendre jusqu'à l'eau par là ! Pourrions-nous faire un petit détour pour aller voir de plus près ? »
languages.original_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"

traits.locale_text: « Regardez, on peut descendre jusqu'à l'eau par là ! Pourrions-nous faire un petit détour pour aller voir de plus près ? »

languages.text: «¡Mire, podemos bajar al agua por aquí! ¿Podríamos desviarnos para acercarnos más?».
languages.original_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mire, podemos bajar al agua por aquí! ¿Podríamos desviarnos para acercarnos más?».

languages.text: 「さあ、この道をたどれば水場まで行けます！少し回り道をすれば、よく見ることができるのでは？」
languages.original_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、この道をたどれば水場まで行けます！少し回り道をすれば、よく見ることができるのでは？」

languages.text: "Bak, buradan suya inmek mümkün! Dilersen... Yolumuzu biraz uzatıp daha yakından bakalım."
languages.original_text: "Look, we can get down to the water this way! Could we, perhaps, take a brief detour for a closer look?"
